Comment: How can anyone justify these deportation. They are sending any immigrant to an El Salvador prison, even people who are not from El Salvador. It is such a human rights violation that makes me sick to my stomach. Thankfully courts are recognizing this but the Trump administration is ignoring the courts. So it's on to the next step, start throwing offenders in prison.
Author: a_little_hazel_nuts
